title: I want to learn Urdu. Where do I start? Do you have good advice? My father is from pakistan origin, so that’s the reason I want to learn the language. I’ve always wanted to learn it, but it’s very difficult! - Quora

response.answer_text: The best way to learn any language is by getting a lot of practice start using Urdu word in you day to day conversations and start reading you can also read some good poetry of Urdu in roman script. Watching some good Hindustani films can help you to learn some Urdu words. You can find lot of videos in YouTube of some great poets of Urdu start watching them. Start with some simple and easy ones. As far as you want to read or write Urdu there are lot of courses available online and you can hire a good teacher if you have time and can afford it. Begin by watching Jashn- e -Rekhta videos on YouTube.
